title: FS - Lajoie Portrait, Waddell throwing, Eddie Collins
author: skelly423

posts.post_title: FS - Lajoie Portrait, Waddell throwing, Eddie Collins
posts.post_content:
I've got 3 beautiful cards for sale.  All 3 are new to my collection, but outside financial considerations are leading me to sell.  All three cards present well, with no obvious creases or wrinkles 

The cards and asking prices are as follows:
Waddell Pitching Piedmont 150/25, PSA 4  - sold
Lajoie Portrait Piedmont 150/25, SGC 2 - sold
Collins Piedmont 350/25 PSA 2.5 - $500

Add $15 to ship the card, no extra costs for multiple cards
I sure wish that Nap was PSA and it would be Ohio bound! GLWS

I'll take the Lajoie portrait.  

Sending a PM.
Waddell and Lajoie sold. Collins price drop
